items.sentence: I think we need to be a little more discreet.
You were behaving as if nothing had happened.
This bridge won't hold the weight of our car.
I want to get out of Boston as soon as I can.
I think Tom and I might do that by ourselves.
Tom is trying to figure out a way to do that.
Tom is the kind of person who never gives up.
Tom is gradually getting used to his new job.
Tom is going to stay in Boston until October.
Tom is going to be leaving in thirty minutes.
